description: Want a simple solution to clean up that excess cobble/deepslate? Well look no further!
This allows automatic pickup and voiding of /d/9/d/ different items and stores /d/256/d/ of that item (at the first tier).

<text>The <light_purple>Pickup Mode</light_purple> can be changed either by <underline>opening the GUI</underline> or pressing '<light_purple><keybind>key.dankstorage.pickup_mode</keybind></light_purple>'.</text>

<text>You can also change from <light_purple>Bag Mode</light_purple> to <light_purple>Construction Mode</light_purple>, by pressing '<light_purple><keybind>key.dankstorage.construction</keybind></light_purple>' which will allow you to place blocks from the bag.</text>
To change what block is selected, __crouch and scroll__ when you have the bag selected and in /d/Construction Mode/d/.
